fields.Title: DAYCHANGE / TEQUILA BED
fields.Description: The dialogue between You and your bed. You can sleep, not sleep, read your ledger.

fields.Title: You: "Go to sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to sleep.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"]  and  DayCount() == 5  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Bed: "The sheets feel at once coarse and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sheets feel at once coarse and clammy against your skin. The bed sags beneath your weight as you stretch out and finally close your eyes...

fields.Title: You: "Go to sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to sleep.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"]  and  DayCount() == 2  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: You: "Go to sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to sleep.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"]  and  DayCount() > 7  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Bed: "The bed is cold and not particularl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bed is cold and not particularly inviting, but it's yours. The sheets look awful...

fields.Title: You: "Go to sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to sleep.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"]  and  DayCount() == 6  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Bed: "Across the room, the heating system..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Across the room, the heating system hums its soft lullaby. The mattress feels soft and sheets warm. It only takes you moments for the world to fall away...
fields.Alternate1: The place feels almost like home now, quiet and dignified around you -- a new life by the seaside. You're incredibly tired. The darkness and warmth come fast. You're falling asleep...
fields.Alternate2: The bed underneath you is soft, if lumpy. Waves wash the sand underneath the hut, then grow distant to your ear. In the quiet hum of the organic heater, you fall asleep...

fields.Title: Bed: "And then sleep doesn't come."
fields.Dialogue Text: And then sleep doesn't come.

fields.Title: Bed: "The window is fixed, the sheets are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The window is fixed, the sheets are new, it's easier to fall asleep than ever before...

fields.Title: Bed: "The sheets feel at once coarse and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sheets feel at once coarse and clammy against your skin. The bed sags beneath your weight as you stretch out and finally close your eyes...

fields.Title: You: "Crawl in."
fields.Dialogue Text: Crawl in.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"] == false  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: You: "No time to rest yet. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: No time to rest yet. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Bed: "The passage of time has not made th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The passage of time has not made the sheets any less coarse. The bed sags beneath your weight as you close your eyes and drift off into an uneasy sleep...
fields.Alternate1: The unchanged linens are only getting greasier and greasier every time you crawl among them. Like some wounded animal you close your eyes and ask for sleep. Just some hours of regular sleep, please...
fields.Alternate2: The room behind your closed eyelids is familiar now. The only home you've ever known. Its darkness gathers. The last thing you hear is the wind blowing in through the broken window, then something comes: a kind of sleep...
fields.Alternate3: It's not easy, but your bones are *so* tired from what feel like *weeks* of work on the case. You have to try. After what feels like hours, you feel you *might* be sleeping...
fields.Alternate4: The bed is still cold from the wind blowing in from the broken window. The mattress creaks as you close your eyes and try your hardest to fall asleep...

fields.Title: Bed: "Across the room, the heating system..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Across the room, the heating system hums a soft lullaby. The mattress feels soft and sheets warm. After some time you fall into uneasy sleep...

fields.Title: You: "Go to sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to sleep.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"]  and  DayCount() == 7  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "The option to go to sleep becomes a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The option to go to sleep becomes available every night after 21.00.

fields.Title: Bed: "The bed is comforting, if a bit run..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bed is comforting, if a bit run down. Still, you've earned a rest.
fields.Alternate1: The bed is alright. You could sleep here -- later, once night has come. To the sound of waves crashing outside... you've earned it.

fields.Title: Bed: "The day has not made the sheets any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The day has not made the sheets any less coarse. The bed sags beneath your weight as you close your eyes and fall into uneasy sleep...

fields.Title: Bed: "The bed is still cold from the brok..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bed is still cold from the broken window, and not too inviting. But it's yours. You've earned it.

fields.Title: You: "Go to sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to sleep.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"]  and  DayCount() == 3  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: You: "Go to sleep."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to sleep.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["auto.daychange_can_sleep"]  and  Variable["whirling.bed_day_1"]  and  DayCount() == 4  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Bed: "The bed's a little nicer now. You c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bed's a little nicer now. You could get a good night's sleep here.
